long_description: Clean chains work best. With this White Lightning system it's easy to keep yours sparkling! Combine the cleaning power of Clean Streak(TM) aerosol degreaser with the scrubbing action of a chain cleaner. Use on multi-geared and single-speed bikes; cleans chain in 20 seconds! Clean Streak cleans straight to the base metal and evaporates quickly with no drying time, no residue and no wiping. Trigger system includes trigger-controlled chain cleaner and 12-oz. aerosol Clean Streak degreaser; cleans up to 30 chains.
short_description: Clean chains work best. With this White Lightning system it's easy to keep yours sparkling!
